name: Apurva!
greetingText: I really enjoy spending time with you...
wishText: Getting to know you over the past year has been something truly special. Every conversation, every shared laugh, and every little moment has only made me appreciate you more. I don’t know what the future holds, but if there's one thing I’m sure of, it’s that I like having you in my life. So, here’s to today, to all the memories we’ve made, and to the many more waiting for us...
